author: Ronald Le
title: A DEX aggregator on Cardano
description: There is a shortage of DEXs, Dapps building on Cardano's Ecosystems
solution: Instamo - A cross-chain DEX aggregator attracts other startups and businesses building the other DEXs on Cardano to grow global communities
experience:
\+ We used to build a DEX 3 years ago.

\+ We had an experience in partnership & integration with Financial institutions, Banks.
